mutants.code:
def reverse_array(arr):
    start = 1
    end = len(arr) - 1
    arr_copy = arr[:]
    while start < end:
        (arr_copy[start], arr_copy[end]) = (arr_copy[end], arr_copy[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return arr_copy

def reverse_array(arr):
    start = -1
    end = len(arr) - 1
    arr_copy = arr[:]
    while start < end:
        (arr_copy[start], arr_copy[end]) = (arr_copy[end], arr_copy[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return arr_copy
